text: Margaret of Denmark (23 June 1456 â€“ 14 July 1486) was Queen of Scotland from 1469 to 1486 by marriage to King James III. She was the daughter of Christian I, King of Denmark, Norway and Sweden, and Dorothea of Brandenburg. title: Margaret of Denmark, Queen of Scotland
